file_content.text: It's fitting that I die here, surrounded by my failures....
Tarro mustn't win the Great Hunt. Don't let his example lead others down the easy path.
Keep honor alive among my people... show them that the old traditions, the code of the warrior, is worthy of defending.
I'll stop Tarro. The rest is up to the Mandalorians.
I'll do what I can.
You walk a treacherous path, hunter.
I'm no Mandalorian... what am I supposed to show them?
Don't know any old traditions.
You are more Mandalorian than you realize. Learn about the past... it will guide your future.
I'm not interested in your codes.
I kill for money.
Unless you believe in something, you will become an empty shell... or a rabid dog.
In the end, all you have is your dignity....
Tarro isn't worthy of such a great teacher. Not by a long shot.
If we ever see him again, I'll tell him that before you blast him.
Must be a real burden... having faith in people.
All this emotion is making me thirsty. Come on, let's find a place with shiny lights and an open bar.
Goodbye, Soongh.
Don't let them get away with this.
Well fought, hunter! I see in you the future of my people.
That's quite a compliment coming from you.
I'm honored.
I merely speak the truth.
You ain't seen nothing yet.
I was just warming up.
I'll hold you to that. I've seen a lot in my time.
If you mean bowing at my feet, then yes.
It won't be like you imagine.
Bold words. May your experience meet your ambition.
This matter is settled. The rest of you shall allow this hunter to finish the Great Hunt in peace.
No, Commander. Our pledge to Tarro stands.
You are no Mandalorians....
You should have shot me first.
Bad move.
That make you feel tough, shooting an old man?
Cowards to the end, eh?
I did him an honor. Better he die for his cause than in his bed.
Now it's your turn.
When I'm standing on your throat, remember: You could have walked away.
I'll enjoy this.
Die, you dog!
Don't let them get away with this.
Enough grandstanding, finish this.
